entry.title: AlexanderHeffernan/ServerWatch: ServerWatch is a system monitoring tool that fetches server performance metrics (CPU, disk usage, etc.) using a lightweight Rust agent, with a static frontend hosted on GitHub Pages for easy visualization.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: jovenlumaas/react-redux-methods: A lightweight and performant react-redux utilities that would help reduce the size of your codebase for creating redux boilerplate. As a result, your codebase would be easy to maintain as it fully utilizes typescript from creating redux contexts (reducers, actions, selectors) to your react component (consuming state, dispatching action).
entry.content: A lightweight and performant react-redux utilities that would help reduce the size of your codebase for creating redux boilerplate. As a result, your codebase would be easy to maintain as it fully utilizes typescript from creating redux contexts (reducers, actions, selectors) to your react component (consuming state, dispatching action).

entry.title: xjsdev/iorpc: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
